segments.source_content: ## Key Concepts

translations.zh-hant: ## 核心概念

segments.source_content: The keys to integrating React Native components into your Android application are to:

translations.zh-hant: 將 React Native 元件整合至 Android 應用的關鍵在於：

segments.source_content:
1. Set up React Native dependencies and directory structure.
2. Develop your React Native components in JavaScript.
3. Add a `ReactRootView` to your Android app. This view will serve as the container for your React Native component.
4. Start the React Native server and run your native application.
5. Verify that the React Native aspect of your application works as expected.

translations.zh-hant:
1. 設定 React Native 依賴項與目錄結構
2. 使用 JavaScript 開發 React Native 元件
3. 在 Android 應用中添加 `ReactRootView`，該視圖將作為 React Native 元件的容器
4. 啟動 React Native 伺服器並運行原生應用
5. 驗證應用中的 React Native 功能是否正常運作

segments.source_content: ## Prerequisites

translations.zh-hant: ## 必要條件

translations.zh-hant: 請依照[環境設定指南](environment-setup)中的 React Native CLI 快速入門，配置您的 Android 版 React Native 應用開發環境。

This makes sure the React Native Gradle Plugin is available inside your project.

segments.source_content: ### Enable native modules autolinking

translations.zh-hant: ### 啟用原生模組自動連結

segments.source_content: To use the power of [autolinking](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli/blob/master/docs/autolinking.md), we have to apply it a few places. First add the following entry to `settings.gradle`:

translations.zh-hant: 要使用[自動連結](https://github.com/react-native-community/cli/blob/master/docs/autolinking.md)功能，需在幾處進行配置。首先在 `settings.gradle` 中加入：

segments.source_content:
```gradle
apply from: file("../node_modules/@react-native-community/cli-platform-android/native_modules.gradle"); applyNativeModulesSettingsGradle(settings)
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_f2f9d525

segments.source_content: Next add the following entry at the very bottom of the `app/build.gradle`:

translations.zh-hant: 接著在 `app/build.gradle` 最底部加入：

```gradle
apply from: file("../../node_modules/@react-native-community/cli-platform-android/native_modules.gradle"); applyNativeModulesAppBuildGradle(project)
```

segments.source_content: ### Cleartext Traffic (API level 28+)

translations.zh-hant: ### 明文流量 (API 等級 28+)

segments.source_content: > Starting with Android 9 (API level 28), cleartext traffic is disabled by default; this prevents your application from connecting to the [Metro bundler][metro]. The changes below allow cleartext traffic in debug builds.

translations.zh-hant: > 從 Android 9 (API 等級 28) 開始，預設禁用明文流量；這會阻止您的應用程式連接到 [Metro 打包器][metro]。以下變更允許在除錯版本中使用明文流量。

segments.source_content: #### 1. Apply the `usesCleartextTraffic` option to your Debug `AndroidManifest.xml`

translations.zh-hant: #### 1. 將 `usesCleartextTraffic` 選項套用到您的除錯版 `AndroidManifest.xml`

segments.source_content:
```xml
<!-- ... -->
<application
  android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="28" >
  <!-- ... -->
</application>
<!-- ... -->
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_71969be5

segments.source_content: This is not required for Release builds.

translations.zh-hant: 正式版本不需要此設定。

segments.source_content: To learn more about Network Security Config and the cleartext traffic policy [see this link](https://developer.android.com/training/articles/security-config#CleartextTrafficPermitted).

translations.zh-hant: 有關網路安全配置和明文流量政策的更多資訊，[請參閱此連結](https://developer.android.com/training/articles/security-config#CleartextTrafficPermitted)。

segments.source_content: ### Creating a release build in Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: ### 在 Android Studio 建立正式版

segments.source_content: You can use Android Studio to create your release builds too! It’s as quick as creating release builds of your previously-existing native Android app.

translations.zh-hant: 您可如同建置原生 Android 應用程式般，使用 Android Studio 快速建立正式版本。

segments.source_content: If you use the React Native Gradle Plugin as described above, everything should work when running app from Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 若按照前述方式使用 React Native Gradle Plugin，直接從 Android Studio 執行應用程式即可。

segments.source_content: If you're not using the React Native Gradle Plugin, there’s one additional step which you’ll have to do before every release build. You need to execute the following to create a React Native bundle, which will be included with your native Android app:

translations.zh-hant: 若未使用該插件，每次正式建置前需額外執行以下命令來產生 React Native 套件（該套件將與原生應用程式一起打包）：

segments.source_content:
```shell
$ npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/com/your-company-name/app-package-name/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/com/your-company-name/app-package-name/src/main/res/
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c34e4bdd

segments.source_content: > Don’t forget to replace the paths with correct ones and create the assets folder if it doesn’t exist.
